name: Keepsake Box
description: This is a keepsake box I made for Amanda. It uses purple heart and black palm wood with brass hardware.

name: Spoons
description: Here is a maple spoon I carved.

name: Patriots End Table
description: This is a poplar end table I made for Bill with a patriots logo burned into it.

name: Nerf Rack
description: Here is the Bond family Nerf Rack with a maple sign with the Nerf logo burned into it.

name: Lego Table
description: This is a Lego table used in our living room. It is made of maple and birch plywood.

name: Hannah’s Necklace
description: This is a necklace I carved for Hannah from maple. It has a secret compartment inside it to store items.

name: Dinosaur Table
description: This is a maple table I wood burnt and stained with a dinosaur scene with a brontosaurus.
